post.text: "As president, only Hillary Clinton will protect DREAMers and families like ours. Talk with your loved ones. Our future is in your hands. If you can vote, vote." â€”Activist and Nevadan Astrid Silva: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Ashlyn
comment.text: If Hillary Clinton is elected, it means: 1. Globalism, not American Exceptionalism 2. Needs of corporations come first, not the people 3. Absolute sanctity of human life is rejected 4. Religion subject to the judgement of secular social engineering 5. Government will make its own rules as it goes along, and decide what information we get It's a high price to pay, just to tell a billionaire that we don't like his style. We HAVE the proof that Clinton is an existential threat to our Democracy. God has given us the power to save this amazing country, all we have to do is go vote.

replies.author: Saige
replies.text: As a professional astrologer I have given a future prediction who will be the next US president? To see this future prediction go to YouTube and put Saige on it. Then you'll see an amazing future prediction about US presidential election.

replies.author: Ashleigh
replies.text: I agree with most parts, but God did not give us the power to save the country, (there are many dictatorships around the world sharing the same God). That was our founding fathers and our constitution.
